title: Validate to_user constraint is not support for Google Drive Upload Activity
custom_steps:
Create AppInstance RTP Policy with these parameters
	Source: User group
	Source: Add Exclusion
	App: Google Drive
	Activity: Upload
	Activity Constraint: to_user
	App Instance
	Action: Alert
	Profile: None
	Destination Country: India
	Status: Enable
custom_expected:
Validate the to_user constraint is not visible for Google Drive Upload Activity
ref: https://netskope.atlassian.net/browse/QE-37363
